Text.Page:
Your exploits in my master's garden entertained him greatly! Saleron welcomes you to stroll through whenever you wish.

So long as you continue to amuse him, Saleron will reward you with something you can use in your world.

He finds his imprisonment quite tedious.

Saleron is pleased. Here is your reward as promised.

As long as you keep Saleron entertained, he will always show you such gratitude.

I'm glad you're hereâ€”my master Saleron bores esily. If you'd care to walk his sky garden again, I'm sure it would cheer him considerably.

And I'd gladly pay to see Saleron happier.
